categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Mayor's Office was a building located on the planet Corellia and served as the official office of the mayor of Kor Vella during the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, the office was occupied by the mayor of Kor Vella Deel Draav. Circa 1 ABY, a CorSec agent working for Lieutenant Lon Cope visited the office to discuss with Deel Draav about an assassination attempt he was victim. After Mayor Draav was finally assassinated in a second attempt, the agent returned to the office and investigated the place. The spacer discovered a large sum of credits sent by the criminals of the Chirq Council in order to bribe the mayor. The CorSec thus understood that Deel Draav was assassinated because he refused the money.

The Mayor's Office appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Mayor's Office was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
